typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Client as string,
		Section as string,
		Level as integer '000',
		{Item Number Txt} as string,
		{Item Number} as double '000,000,000.000',
		Question as string,
		Response as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Score } as double '000,000,000.000',
		Critical as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> CISFile
CISFile sink(input(
		Client as string,
		Section as string,
		Level as double,
		{Item Number Txt} as double,
		{Item Number} as double,
		Question as string,
		Response as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Score } as double,
		Critical as string,
		U_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'MM-dd-yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
